title: Unidentified condensed grotesque "défilé"
content:
Hello,  
I tried with Whatthefont & Identifont, but I couldn't find any approaching sample.  
Maybe some of you may give me hints on the origin (if not the plain name of course) of this font ?  
Thanks in advance !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [defile.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053357/http:/typophile.com/files/defile.jpg) | 4.59 KB |
author: szlobodan

comments.content: have you considered a custom change on Univers ultra condensed?

The quality of this typeface is so poor I can't help but suspect this is either a very clumsy customisation or a rubbish rip-off of something like Univers (Extra) Condensed or Monotype Grotesque (Extra) Condensed. :^/

"The quality of this typeface is so poor I can’t help but suspect this is either a very clumsy customisation or a rubbish rip-off ..."

Yves, you are right. It does look like it has been "Defiled" :-)

ChrisL

PS: You and Hrant are tied at 64 posts, "you can do it man!"
